Detailed Description

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Fob Interface

Author:
Raphael Grasset
Version:
1.0
Date:
10/04/2004
This interface provide access to Flock of Birds Tracker. The Flock of Birds (FOB) delivers 6DOF data in real-time frequency.

Remarks:
the Bird need a specific hemisphere for be operating. you need furthermore to put the bird in this hemisphere at startup otherwise you will be have false value return.

we change the default coordinate system to match the openGL coordinate system more usable.
